features.name: voting
features.title: Voting
features.description: Viewers can add movies, games, or their own text as options. Can be limited to subs/followers only.

features.name: chatVoting
features.title: Chat Voting
features.description: Viewers enter their options directly in the twitch chat. The streamer sees them on the site and can choose the winner.

features.name: chatGoal
features.title: Chat Goal
features.description: Vote for or against something until you get the required number of votes. There is a widget for OBS.

voting.title: Voting
voting.deleteVotingDialog: Do you really want to delete this voting?
voting.deleteVotingOptionDialog: Do you really want to delete this voting option?
voting.noOptions: В этом голосовании пока нет ни одного варианта
voting.youCannotParticipateInThisVoting: You cannot participate in this voting

custom.description: Users can enter their own text

kinopoiskMovie.description: Users can suggest a movie from kinopoisk.ru

igdbGame.description: Users can suggest a game from IGDB.com

votingForm.whoCanAddOptionsTooltip: Channel owner and editors always can add and delete voting options

votingOptionForm.movieNameTooltip: Start typing a movie title and choose one from suggested
votingOptionForm.gameNameTooltip: Start typing a game title and choose one from suggested
